reviewText: Wrong region need one for basic American

I enjoyed the Billy Paul documentary.  I learned a lot about his life in which I enjoyed.  I lent this film to a friend who also enjoyed the movie as well.  Everyone should go out and purchase this dvd.

"Me and Mrs. Jones" had to be one of the great R&B records of the '80s and Billy Paul should have been one of that era's greatest stars. The first happened but with a follow-up with "Am I Black Enough For You" he was not well-received by Blacks or whites and especially the radio DJs.
This is a story of which I was never aware and I live in Philadelphia much of that time.
It's a was a fascinatingly well-told tale needing to be told.
